version_description: Fixed a potential crash on some devices.

The latest version brings some substantial game enhancements:
- 2 new entry level challenges
- Targeting helper that indicates the impact area
- Revised core UI
Version 2.0 - Major update with 6 additional levels, greatly improved controls and some graphical enhancements, turning the game into a more polished puzzling experience.
Version 2.0 - Major update with 6 additional levels, greatly improved controls and some graphical enhancements, turning the game into a more polished puzzling experience.

- Extended tutorial with navigation section
- Added rubber band effect for locked camera views
- Improved iPhone X compatibility

Greatly improved impact effects: no more white circles for the blast wave visualization!

Other fixes:
- Enhancements for iPhone X
- Support for playing background audio (Spotify, etc.) when game audio gets disabled

- Improved support for iPad Pro
- Added visualization of thermal damage from fireball
